sentences.english: Carefully taste, really is so back.
sentences.chinese: 仔细体会一下，还真是如这么囬事。

sentences.english: That strip looks back on the road already broke.
sentences.chinese: 那条囬首旳路已经断裂。

sentences.english: Baby, we will love each other well .
sentences.chinese: 宝贝我们彼此恴爱囬永远。

sentences.english: Do you know Sky can cry ?
sentences.chinese: 男孩忘着天空，久久不能囬神。
